summary: Encompassed by violent street gangs, neglectful parents, bullying teachers and a dearth of positive role models, a studious but emotionally abandoned kid turns thug.
cast: Conor McCarron|Greg Forrest|Joe Szula|Mhairi Anderson|Gary Milligan|John Joe Hay|Christopher Wallace|Richard Mack|Paul Smith|Khai Nugent|Ryan Walker|Lee Fanning|Ross Greig|Greg McCreadie|Scott Ingram|Cameron Fulton|Craig Kerr|Martin Bell|Kat Murphy|Stefanie Szula|Annie Watson|Zoe Halliday|Sara MacCallum|John Forrest|Louis McLaughlin|David O'Brien|Ross Weston|Claire Gordon|Marcus Nash|Victoria Rose|Chelsey Hanratty|Peter Mullan|Louise Goodall|Marianna Palka|Steven Robertson|Leigh Biagi|Laurie Ventry|Alex Donald|Paul Donnelly|David McKay|Peter Lochburn|Frank Miller|Stephen McCole|Gary Lewis|Kenny O'Hara|Joe Cassidy|Lori McLean|Linda Jane Devlin|Jason Harvey|Alex McSherry|Gordon Brown|Robert McDevitt|Sammy Hayman|Douglas Russell|Gary Hollywood|Wendy Crosby|James McAnerney|Jamie Francis Campbell|Robert Findlay|Joanna Kaczynska|Colin McGowan|Christopher McPhillips
title: Neds
